ValidationRule.description: This validation rule will check to see if the invoice date has already been set for a donation record and prevent overwriting the value.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Donation_Process_Status__c), ISPICKVAL( Donation_Process_Status__c,'Invoiced'), NOT(ISNULL( Invoice_Date__c )), NOT($Setup.Americord_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rule__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invoice Date has already been set for this record. Contact the system admin in order to overwrite the Invoiced Date value.
